PropertyList.title: Curtiss Wright C-46 Commando
PropertyList.line: Switch the magnetos to 3 ("}" button three times).
Start the engine starter with "s". This takes a few seconds.
When you hear/see the running engine release the s button.
Set the flaps to two notches ("]" two times).
Release parking Brake (B or lever on center console).
Lock the tailwheel straight by pressing "l" (or using the lever on the center console),
or use your brakes on , and . (comma/period) buttons for steering.
Full power to takeoff.
Tail will come up about 60 mph.
Rotate at correct takeoff speed for load (85-95 mph).
Bring up gear by pressing "g".
Climb out at 120 mph up to 1000' above ground level.
Open oil cooler doors by using levers on center console.
Retract the flaps as needed.
Reduce throttle, and continue climb out at 130 - 140 mph.
Set Supercharger to high (lever up) upon reaching 10,000 ft.
